term.title: colloidal carbon

item.text: A particulate carbon with particle sizes below ca.1000 nm in at least one dimension.

notes.item: colloidal carbon exists in several morphologically distinct forms.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 473. 'Recommended terminology for the description of carbon as a solid (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 486 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567030473)
